alert.note: Alert for Cameron; Centre; Clearfield (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 11:19PM EDT until July 13 at 11:45PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM EDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL CAMERON...NORTHWESTERN CENTRE AND NORTHEASTERN CLEARFIELD COUNTIES... At 1119 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Plymptonville to Lecontes Mills to North Philipsburg, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Philipsburg, Chester Hill, Karthaus, Snow Shoe, North Philipsburg, Clarence, South Philipsburg, Moshannon, Pine Glen, Lecontes Mills, Morrisdale and Grassflat. For those driving on Interstate 80, this includes areas between the Woodland and Milesburg exits, specifically from mile markers 128 to 147. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
